name: Golduck BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Hyper Transfer
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

rule_box: Golduck BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
